overview: The laziest house pets around are back! Jerry, Mandy and their hilarious squawker buddy Frank the parrot can't agree on what to do when their owners leave for the day, but when Funny Pets comes on TV, the gang has everything they need! While the three buddies watch their favorite TV show they bark, meow and squawk about the funniest, craziest, and wackiest animals in the kingdom. The Funny World of Pets 2 is the purrfect movie for any pet lover!
title: The Funny World Of Pets 2
